question: What was your relationship to {NAME}?
When was {NAME} born?
Where was {NAME} born, and where did they spend most of their life?
How would you describe {NAME}'s physical appearance - their height, build, distinctive features?
What was {NAME}'s marital status? If married, tell me about their spouse.
Did {NAME} have children? If so, can you tell me about them?
What was {NAME}'s primary occupation or career throughout their life?
Can you tell me about {NAME}'s parents - their names and what you knew about them?
Did {NAME} have siblings? What can you share about their brothers and sisters?
What do you know about {NAME}'s extended family - grandparents, aunts, uncles, cousins?
How would you describe {NAME}'s family dynamics and relationships?
If {NAME} was married more than once, can you tell me about their other marriages?
What do you remember about {NAME}'s relationship with their children?
Did {NAME} have grandchildren? What was their relationship like with them?
What family traditions or customs were important to {NAME}?
How did {NAME} meet their spouse or significant other? What do you remember about their courtship?
What do you know about any family difficulties or challenges {NAME} faced?
Were there any family members {NAME} was particularly close to or distant from?
What role did {NAME} typically play in family gatherings or celebrations?
Where did {NAME} go to school? What do you know about their education?
What was {NAME}'s career path? How did they get started in their profession?
What were the major moves or relocations in {NAME}'s life? Why did they move?
What significant life events shaped who {NAME} became?
Did {NAME} serve in the military? What can you tell me about their service?
What health challenges did {NAME} face throughout their life?
What were some of {NAME}'s major life accomplishments or achievements?
Did {NAME} have any life-changing experiences or turning points you're aware of?
What do you know about {NAME}'s retirement years? How did they spend that time?
What were the circumstances surrounding {NAME}'s final illness or passing?
Who were {NAME}'s closest friends? What can you tell me about these relationships?
What social groups, clubs, or organizations was {NAME} involved with?
How did {NAME} contribute to their community? What causes mattered to them?
Was {NAME} religious or spiritual? How did faith play a role in their life?
What were {NAME}'s mentors or role models? Who influenced them significantly?
What kind of social circle did {NAME} maintain? Were they outgoing or more private?
Did {NAME} have any enemies or difficult relationships? What do you know about those?
How would you describe {NAME}'s personality? What were their most distinctive traits?
What was {NAME}'s sense of humor like? What made them laugh?
How did {NAME} handle stress, conflict, or difficult situations?
What values or principles seemed most important to {NAME}?
How did {NAME} communicate? Were they talkative, quiet, direct, diplomatic?
What were {NAME}'s hobbies, interests, or passions outside of work?
What did {NAME} worry about? What kept them up at night?
How did others typically react to {NAME}? What impression did they make on people?
What is your most vivid or treasured memory of {NAME}?
What would {NAME} want to be remembered for? What was their legacy?
Is there a story about {NAME} that perfectly captures who they were as a person?
What advice or wisdom did {NAME} share that stayed with you?
If {NAME} could see their family and friends today, what do you think they would say?
What aspects of {NAME}'s character do you see living on in their children or family members?
